plugins.name: X8 Content Machine
plugins.description:
Transforme seus carrosséis no Figma com inteligência, agilidade e personalização.


X8 Content Machine é um plugin inteligente que automatiza a inserção de textos, imagens e paletas de cores diretamente nos seus templates do Figma. Ideal para designers, social medias e equipes de marketing, ele permite montar carrosséis visualmente incríveis em poucos cliques.


⚙️ Funcionalidades principais:

  1. Aplicação automática de textos em múltiplos frames com organização por tópicos.
  2. Upload e ordenação de imagens com visualização numerada e arraste para reordenar.
  3. Paletas de cores personalizadas e pré-definidas, com suporte a edição e preview em tempo real.l.


🚀 Interface intuitiva com abas separadas para textos, imagens e cores.


🔁 Integração perfeita com o Figma, mantendo o fluxo de criação rápido e fluido.


💡 Perfeito para quem quer:

Ganhar tempo na criação de conteúdo visual.

Padronizar projetos com rapidez.

Automatizar a produção de artes para redes sociais.
plugins.tagline: Altere textos, imagens e cores de templates figma em alguns cliques

plugins.name: Font Replacer - Compact
plugins.description:
📝 Description

Transform your text styles in seconds! The fastest way to batch update font styles in Figma with minimal effort.


✨ Key Features

- One-click batch replacement for multiple text layers

- Lightning-fast font style updates

- Real-time font preview with instant search

- Auto-detect and display mixed text styles

- Seamless dark mode support

- Clean, minimal interface for maximum efficiency


🚀 Quick Start

1. Select text layers or frames

2. Pick your font settings

3. Click update - Done!


⚠️ Notes

- Ensure target fonts are installed in Figma

- Font names are case-sensitive

- Plugin automatically adapts to Figma's theme


🔧 Troubleshooting

Common issues and quick fixes:

- Font not updating? → Check if font is installed

- Text not changing? → Ensure layers are unlocked

- Nothing selected? → Select text layers first


If you have any suggestions, please feel free to let me know, thanks ❤

Contact: kingyo@live.com
plugins.tagline: A super efficient Figma plugin for replacing text styles with minimal clicks.

plugins.name: Color Mapper

Effortlessly swap and remap colors in your designs while preserving library styles. Perfect for theme switching, brand updates, and design system management.

Smart library style preservation

Batch update multiple elements at once

Support for both direct colors and style swatches

Works with fills and strokes


Simply select elements, drag colors to remap them, and apply changes with a single click. Color Mapper automatically detects and preserves your library styles while making color updates lightning fast.

plugins.name: Frame Name to Text
plugins.description:
Do you find it frustrating when exporting a flow and frame names don’t appear? With Frame to Text, you can easily convert frame names into editable text layers with just one click!


This plugin can help you:


Convert frame names into editable text layers.

Automatically update text layers by running the plugin again after changing frame names.

Enhance your design workflow and ensure your exports are clear and informative!

plugins.name: m16n
plugins.description:
{
    "general": {
        "sample" :[
            "The text layer named 'general.sample' will be changed this string when '0' is selected.",
            "'1' を選択すると、'general.sample' という名称のテキスト要素がこのテキストに書き換わります。"
        ],
        "back": [
            "back",
            "戻る"
        ]
    },
    "stage_1": {
        "S_information": {
            "title": [
                "Information",
                "お知らせ"
            ]
        },
        "S_login": {
            "title": [
                "Sign in ",
                "ログイン"
            ]
        }
    }
}


How to use


  1. Specify text layer name according to the JSON hierarchy structure. (e.g. ) general.back or stage1.S_information.title
  2. Select the element you want to change.
  3. Launch plugin.
  4. Upload json file from button.
  5. If you select Language index "0",
  6. and press "Update word",
  7. then, for example, the value of text layer named "general.back" will be replaced to "back".


  • If the Target node is "Only selected Nodes", only selected elements are replaced. If "All", all elements are replaced. (The "All" option may not be able to process pages of enormous size.)
  • The language designation is an array number, so any numbers of languages can be added.
plugins.tagline: Manage multiple languages in a single json file.

plugins.name: Bulk image exporter
plugins.description:
Speed up your workflow by exporting all images from your Figma page in just one click! This plugin collects every image and packs them into a handy ZIP file — no more exporting one by one.


You can also set a size limit (default: 1MB) to automatically compress images without losing too much quality. Perfect for quick exporting, sharing assets with devs and optimizing performance.


Features:


  1. Export all images on the current page in a ZIP file
  2. Set max size per image (e.g. 1MB or less)
  3. Check the current download status.
  4. Download each image individually


👉 Please note: this plugin is currently in beta, feedback is welcome!

accepted.name: Lorenzo Brandimarte
accepted.description: Product and UI Designer | No-code developer

plugins.tagline: Export every image on your page in a single ZIP

plugins.name: FigTextExporter
plugins.description:
# FigText Exporter: AI-Powered Translation Export Plugin for Figma


Transform your Figma text layers into translation-ready JSON files instantly with FigText - the smart localization assistant for designers and developers.


## Key Features


- *Automatic Text Detection:* Scans your Figma files and identifies all text layers that need translation

- *Smart JSON Generation:* Creates structured JSON translation files with nested keys based on your design hierarchy

- *Multi-Language Support:* Export translation files for multiple languages simultaneously

- *Context Preservation:* Maintains the original context of text elements for more accurate translations


## Benefits


- *Time Savings:* Convert hours of manual work into seconds of automated processing

- *Improved Workflow:* Seamlessly integrate with your development pipeline

- *Error Prevention:* Reduce human error in translation file creation

- *Team Efficiency:* Perfect for small teams looking to streamline their localization process


🚀 Stop spending valuable time on manual translation file creation. Let FigText handle the tedious work while you focus on what matters most - creating amazing designs.


## How It Works


1. Select your text layers in Figma

2. Run FigText plugin

3. Choose your target languages

4. Get your translation-ready JSON files instantly


Perfect for developers and designers who want to maintain productivity without getting bogged down by repetitive localization tasks.
plugins.tagline: Easily export and translate text from figma projects

plugins.name: Thumb Zone AI
plugins.description:
The Thumb Zone plugin enables you to add your frames to the platform and test it with your users. This plugin can be used for mobile UIs and allows you to perform various types of tests such as UI audit, predicting user behavior, conducting tests with synthetic users, as well as testing with real users to study their emotions.


To add a file from Thumb Zone to Figma, follow the steps below:


  1. Install the plugin.
  2. Define a new product in Thumb Zone.
  3. Select the "Import from Figma" option in Thumb Zone.
  4. Generate a token.
  5. Enter the received token in the Figma plugin.
  6. Select the frames.
  7. Sync!


Frames are synced to Thumb Zone screens, build and test your flow!


Visit https://thumbzone.ai to create your account.

accepted.name: Thumb Zone
accepted.description: AI copilot for mobile user testing

plugins.tagline: Emotion AI for Product Experience

125713.description:

To add a file from Thumb Zone to Figma, follow the steps below:


  1. Install the plugin.
  2. Define a new product in Thumb Zone.
  3. Select the "Import from Figma" option in Thumb Zone.
  4. Generate a token.
  5. Enter the received token in the Figma plugin.
  6. Select the frames.
  7. Sync!


Frames are synced to Thumb Zone screens, build and test your flow!


Visit https://thumbzone.ai to create your account.

plugins.name: BizTag - Name Tag Generator
plugins.description:
Automating the name tag design process


Conferences, case comps, and hackathons make up the highlights of many student's time in universities. Why? Because they combine hands-on learning, creativity, teamwork, networking, and the thrill of solving real-world challenges in a lively, collaborative environment.


If you've ever attended one of these events, you might notice that professional partners have name tags around their neck. Designing these name tags can take hours of manual work to make the layouts consistent and audit for content mistakes. But what if all that work could be done with the click of a button?


Meet BizTag


BizTag is a powerful Figma plugin that is built by a designer, for designers. The app communicates with Figma's Plugin API to build a series of clean, customizable, and organized name tags.


All it takes is a background image with a resolution of your choosing, and a .csv file populated with information on your event partners, and you can generate dozens of name tags instantly. The plugin automatically places name, company, and pronouns on the frontside, and generates a QR code to place on the backside using a QR code API.


Each frame comes with auto layout, enabling ease of customizability for the designer.


Schema


The schema is as follows:


type Partner = {
firstname: string;
lastname: string;
position: string; // Position @ Company
pronouns: string; // etc. They / Them
linkedin: string; // LinkedIn Profile URL
};

type PartnerList = Partner[];


where the .json / .csv file is taken as a single PartnerList object.
plugins.tagline: Automate your graphic design process

plugins.name: UILENS™ - UI Components
plugins.description:
UILENS™ - UI Design Components

Helps creators and teams design user interfaces faster. It offers a collection of high-detail, professional UI components that you can easily import into Figma, keeping your designs consistent and efficient.


HOW IT WORKS

1. Browse

Discover the perfect components that suit your project's requirements and spark your creativity.


2. Copy to clipboard

Simply click over any component to copy to clipboard, enabling you to easily paste-import it into your Figma project.


3. Paste into Figma

Paste directly (Cmd+V for Mac or Ctrl+V for Windows) into Figma and watch as the component becomes a part of your project.


Learn more - uilens.com


Made with ♥️

by Voicu Apostol

cerpow.com
plugins.tagline: Create beautiful designs with our professional UI components.

Simply click over any component to copy to clipboard, enabling you to easily paste-import it into your Figma project.


3. Paste into Figma

Paste directly (Cmd+V for Mac or Ctrl+V for Windows) into Figma and watch as the component becomes a part of your project.


Learn more - uilens.com


Made with ♥️

by Voicu Apostol

plugins.name: slajdomat
plugins.description: Using this plugin, you can create in Figma a presentation where slides are changed by zooming in or out. Each slide is a frame, and the plugin is used to connect the slides to each other, and to export the presentation. The presentation is exported into a web page. To make the plugin work, you need to download a standalone program which will import the presentation from Figma, and create the appropriate web page. https://github.com/bojanczyk/slajdomat/
plugins.tagline: Make zooming slide presentations

plugins.name: IconPilot
plugins.description:
🚀 IconPilot: The Ultimate Icon Management Plugin for Your Design System!


Say goodbye to hours of manual work prepping icons for your design system. IconPilot simplifies converting your individual stroke and outline icons into fully customizable multi-variant components in seconds, streamlining your workflow and maintaining consistency across your design system.


✨ Key Use Cases:

  1. Quickly convert hundreds of stroke or outline icons into organized multi-variant components.
  2. Define custom sizes, stroke widths, and colors once—then apply effortlessly across your entire icon set.
  3. Maintain design consistency using Figma variables to automatically sync icon properties.


🔧 Seamless Workflow:

  1. Select your icons (components or frames).
  2. Set variant names, sizes, stroke widths, and colors (raw values or Figma variables).
  3. Click convert—IconPilot instantly generates neatly organized icon components ready for your design system.


💡 Powerful Features:

  1. Bulk convert from single icons to thousands at once.
  2. Intelligent Figma variables filtering—only relevant variables appear for size, stroke, or color fields.
  3. Auto-generated search-friendly descriptions to effortlessly find icons in assets.
  4. Persistent configurations—set once, reuse endlessly within your file.
  5. Figma-native UX for seamless integration into your workflow.


Elevate your design system management. Try IconPilot now and spend your valuable time designing, not managing icons.
plugins.tagline: Convert individual icons into multi-variant component sets quickly and consistently.

127281.name: IconPilot
127281.description:
🚀 IconPilot: The Ultimate Icon Management Plugin for Your Design System!


Say goodbye to hours of manual work prepping icons for your design system. IconPilot simplifies converting your individual stroke and outline icons into fully customizable multi-variant components in seconds, streamlining your workflow and maintaining consistency across your design system.

  2. Define custom sizes, stroke widths, and colors once—then apply effortlessly across your entire icon set.

Elevate your design system management. Try IconPilot now and spend your valuable time designing, not managing icons.
127281.release_notes:
1. Currently semantic descriptions based on icons initial naming has partial support (only Lucid icons supported). Next update focus is to make this universal. 
2. Converting hundreds of icons may take a while. Will try to boost performance as well. 
3. At the moment, the plugin doesn’t support icons with multiple vector layers, though I’m not sure if anyone needs this, so I’m currently validating the need.
127281.tagline: Convert individual icons into multi-variant component sets quickly and consistently.

plugins.name: Local Variables Starter
plugins.description:
Figma Plugin Local Variables Starter


A Figma plugin starter kit that helps you create local variables from predefined design tokens. This plugin automatically generates color, spacing, typography, and radius variables in your Figma file.


Features


  1. 🎨 Color variables with RGB values
  2. 📏 Spacing system (including negative values)
  3. 📝 Typography settings (size, weight, line height)
  4. 🔄 Border radius presets
  5. ✨ Customizable collection and mode names
  6. 🔄 Resizable plugin window
  7. ✅ Selective token category generation
plugins.tagline: A starter kit that helps you create local variables from predefined design tokens.

plugins.name: Text Style Capture - FREE Copy and Paste
plugins.description:
Beta 0.1

Hi there! I built this plugin to solve a problem I face every day: transferring text styles between Figma files.

This simple solution helps you quickly capture text styles from one file and paste them into another, maintaining all the original properties. No more recreating styles from scratch or dealing with inconsistencies!

It's still in early beta (version 0.1), but it already saves me tons of time, and I hope it helps you too.

Key features:


One-click text style capture

Select which styles to transfer

Persistent storage between sessions

Clean, modern interface


I'd love to hear your feedback! If you encounter any bugs or have suggestions for improvements, please let me know. I'm actively working on making this plugin better.

If you find this helpful and want to support further development, you can buy me a coffee.

Thanks for trying it out!
plugins.tagline: Copy and paste Text Styles

plugins.name: Stroke Shortcuts
plugins.description:
A tool for quickly adjusting stroke settings of Figma objects.


Key features:

• Increase/decrease stroke weight (+1/-1)

• Cycle stroke position inside/outside

• Apply to multiple selected objects at once


Streamline your design workflow and make stroke adjustments with ease.


---


Figmaオブジェクトのストローク設定を素早く調整するプラグインです。


主な機能：

• ストロークの太さを増減（+1/-1）

• ストロークの位置を内側/外側に切り替え

• 選択したオブジェクトに一括適用可能


デザインワークフローを効率化し、ストローク調整を簡単に行えます。
plugins.tagline: Stroke Control: A shortcut plugin for quick stroke weight and position adjustments

plugins.name: HypoGen: Simplify Hypothesis Creation in Figma
plugins.description:
HypoGen is a Figma plugin designed to streamline hypothesis generation, making it easy for designers and product teams to turn ideas into clear, testable statements. With simple prompts, HypoGen guides users to articulate their goals, assumptions, and expected outcomes, helping teams create well-structured hypotheses for design experiments and product improvements.


What You’ll Find:

•Guided Input Fields: Fill in prompts that help you clarify the problem, proposed solution, and expected impact.

•Instant Hypothesis Notes: Generate neatly formatted hypotheses directly on your Figma canvas, keeping ideas accessible and organized within your design environment.

•Consistent Structure: Follow a standardized hypothesis framework, ensuring your team’s testing approach is clear, goal-oriented, and easy to measure.


What You’ll Learn:

•How to Define Clear Hypotheses: Learn to break down design ideas into structured hypotheses that are actionable and focused on measurable results.

•Hypothesis-Driven Design Thinking: Incorporate hypothesis-based thinking into your design process, empowering you to test assumptions and make data-informed decisions with confidence.

•Effective Experimentation Practices: Develop hypotheses that drive meaningful experiments, improving your product iteratively with a user-centered approach.


Make your design decisions testable with HypoGen—create hypotheses effortlessly and start building with purpose.

accepted.name: ASSIST Software
accepted.description:
Design work that converts. 
From idea to market 🚀
Design team @ ASSIST Software

plugins.tagline: Hypothesis Creation Made Simple, Right Inside Figma.

plugins.name: Back to square zero™
plugins.description:
This plugin will group all content on the current page, set the position to be x=0 and y=0, and then ungroup your content again.


When another user opens the page for the first time, the content will always be within the default Figma zoom area!


Run this plugin on each page...


Video demo → https://youtu.be/_RmKBVBIpW4?si=i4tlU7SOZ26aUIFp

plugins.name: Designlens
plugins.description:
DesignLens is your AI design assistant — built right inside Figma.

Get instant, actionable feedback on your designs so you can iterate faster, ship smarter, and design with confidence.


Design reviews are often slow, inconsistent, and filled with vague feedback like “make it cleaner” or “this doesn’t feel right.” You’re left guessing what to fix — or worse, waiting days just to hear back.

DesignLens fixes that. With just a click inside Figma, DesignLens analyzes your screen and gives you detailed feedback — instantly.


⚙️ How it works:

1. Select any frame in Figma

2. Run the DesignLens plugin

3. Get clear, structured feedback in seconds



🔍 What it does:


1. UI/Visual Analysis

Get insights on layout, hierarchy, accessibility, consistency, and overall clarity.

We don’t just point out issues — we tell you what’s working, what needs fixing, and how to fix it.


2. Heuristic Evaluation

Your design is evaluated against proven usability principles (like error prevention, recognition over recall, and user control) — helping you catch friction points before users do.


👀 Coming soon:

- UX flow-level analysis

- Business goal alignment


We're just getting started.


📬 Feedback or questions?

Reach us anytime at trydesignlens@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Design Feedback made Accessible

132070.description:

plugins.name: Darker
plugins.description:
Tired of manually creating dark mode versions of your designs? Darker makes it super easy! Just click once and watch your light design transform into a beautiful dark theme. Perfect for new designers who want to create professional dark modes without the headache.


What it does:

  1. Converts colors smartly - no more guessing what looks good in dark mode
  2. Works with everything - from simple shapes to complex designs
  3. Keeps your design system intact - whether you use Variables or Styles
  4. Has a handy reset button if you want to start over
  5. uper simple to use - literally just one click!


Start creating dark themes in seconds, not hours. Darker handles the complex stuff so you can focus on designing.

plugins.name: Winding Rule Inspector
plugins.description:
Warning: If you don't know what Winding Rules are, you probably don't need this plugin.


If you want to know more about winding rules, follow this link: https://oreillymedia.github.io/Using_SVG/extras/ch06-fill-rule.html


This plugin allows designers to quickly inspect the winding rule of vector objects in Figma. It provides instant feedback about the selected vector's winding rule, helping you understand and manage the rendering behavior of complex vector shapes.


Key features:

- Automatically displays the winding rule of the selected vector object

- Updates in real-time as you select different vector objects

- Provides clear notifications for non-vector selections or when no object is selected

- Runs unobtrusively in the background, allowing you to continue your design work


How to use:

1. Run the plugin

2. Select any vector object in your Figma design

3. A notification will appear showing the winding rule of the selected vector

4. As you select different vector objects, the notification will update automatically


This tool is perfect for designers working with complex vector illustrations, icons, or any projects where precise control over vector rendering is crucial. Understanding the winding rule can help resolve unexpected rendering issues and ensure your vectors display correctly across different platforms and use cases.


Note: This plugin only works with vector objects. Selecting any other type of object will result in a notification indicating that the selected object is not a vector.

accepted.name: Thierry
accepted.description: I am Thierry – a designer, developer, and, typographer based New York. I’ve worked with companies large and small, building and maintaining design systems.

plugins.tagline: This plugin allows designers to quickly inspect the winding rule of vector objects in Figma.

plugins.name: Gene UI Tokens Hub
plugins.description:
Gene UI Tokens Hub

Streamline your design-to-development workflow with Gene UI Tokens Hub, a Figma plugin that connects your design system tokens to your GitHub repository.


Key Features

  1. Sync Figma variables and explore them using JSON tree and variable collections filters
  2. Connect to GitHub and push changes to your style dictionary package
  3. Generate CSS3 and JavaScript variables from your design tokens


Benefits

  1. Automate the process of converting tokens into code
  2. Ensure consistency across your design system, design, and development teams
  3. Save time and reduce errors during the sync process of tokens


How it Works

  1. Install the Gene UI Tokens Hub plugin in your Figma account
  2. Make changes in Figma built-in variables and use it in your design styles
  3. Open the Gene UI Tokens Hub, and connect your GitHub repository to the plugin
  4. Review your changes and push them to your GitHub repository, where your style dictionary package will be generated
plugins.tagline: The Gene UI design system tokens hub plugin to keep aligned tokens between design and development

plugins.name: Aiden HX - Figma to App
plugins.description:
Aiden HX is an innovative suite of AI-driven tools and frameworks designed to enhance the human experience of digital interactions.


Aiden HX for Figma, features a plugin that empowers developers by dramatically accelerating the conversion of Figma design assets into target technologies.


With this plugin, designs can be:

•Seamlessly transformed

•Directly deployed into enterprise platforms like Unqork,

•Converted into target not just the visual layout, but also all the essential UI controls and stylesheets


The key benefits are:

•Eliminates the traditional, time-consuming development process

•Allows teams to move faster from concept to production


Looking ahead, Aiden HX plans to expand its capabilities by supporting additional target technologies, including leading low-code platforms, Angular, and React.


This evolving roadmap ensures that the Aiden HX suite remains at the forefront of digital experience design, providing flexibility and agility to adapt to the rapidly changing technological landscape. Discover how Aiden AI can benefit your business at https://aidenai.com/


To know more about the our aiDAP (Digital Transformation platform) and our other offerings, please visit https://aidenai.com/#/services#platform


Contact us at https://aidenai.com/#/contact or info@aidenai.com
plugins.tagline: AI driven transformation of user experience designs on Figma to digital apps.
